articles.description: Opening on Wednesday, this year’s festival will host 164 feature films, from Roald Dahl’s Matilda the Musical to Guillermo del Toro’s Pinocchio
articles.content: Autumn is the cinephiles favourite season, with back-to-back film festivals across a number of global destinations. But for UK-based film enthusiasts, domestic events take centre stage. And of those,… [+3557 chars]

articles.author: Guardian staff reporter
articles.title: Like stepping inside a migraine – the house that is covered in doodles - The Guardian
articles.description: Artist Sam Cox has just finished drawing on every inch of his six-bedroom house in Kent, inside and out. But what does his partner think of it?
articles.content:
Name: Doodles.
Age: The first bored woman probably traced a sooty finger along a cave wall about 73,000 years ago.
Appearance: Anything you like: squiggly lines, Ed Sheerans head on a lobsters body… [+2523 chars]
